|brand = QNAP |model = QHora-301W |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2023/02/19 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/qnap/qnap_qhora-301w |wlclass = AX36002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = NCCCCAH20LP5350T7 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8072A;IPQ8072A (Hawkeye 2) Quad-core 2.2GHz 64-bit CPU; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.2 GHz <!-- 2.0 GHz 2.2 GHz 1.4 GHz (+ NPU @1.7GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Aquantia;AQR113C; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 10GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.2 (Gen 1) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = Power, WPS, Reset |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 250×180×48 mm |weight = 1.9kg
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5024; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 1182 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 2475 |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview==
*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A (Hawkeye 2) :Quad-core 2.2GHz 64-bit WiSoC *Flash: 4GB (eMMC), Memory: 1GB *Ports: 2x 10GbE (RJ45), 4x 1GbE (RJ45) :USB: 2x USB 3.2 (Gen 1) ports *Wireless Standard: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax :Frequency Band: 2.4/5GHz (Dual Band) :Wireless Speed Rating: AX3600 *Wireless Speed: 1182Mbps (2.4GHz) 4x4 (40MHz) :2475Mbps (5GHz) 4x4 (80MHz), 2x2 (160MHz) :Wireless Bandwidth: 20/40/80/160MHz *Antenna Type: 8x internal antennas :Antenna Gain 2.4GHz: 4.5dBi :Antenna Gain 5GHz: 5.2dBi
==Links of Interest== *[https://nascompares.com/2020/09/14/new-qnap-qhora-301w-wifi-6-10gbe-router-revealed/ New QNAP QHora-301W WiFi 6 10GbE Router Revealed] *[https://fccid.io/NCC/CCAH20LP5350T7 FCC ID: NCC/CCAH20LP5350T7] (2020-06-29) QHora-301W :''New Generation WiFi 6 and Dual 10GbE Port SD-WAN Router''
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/qnap/qnap_qhora-301w |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/qnap/301w |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/adding-openwrt-support-for-qnap-qhora-301w/96934 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = qualcommax |subtarget = ipq807x |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} QCA8075 4 x RJ-45 1 Gigabit (10/100/1000 Mbps) Ethernet (WAN/LAN) + Aquantia AQR113C 2 x RJ-45 10 Gigabit (10G/5G/2.5G/1G/100Mbps) Ethernet (WAN/LAN)
8 internal 5dBi Antennas / Dual-Band 5G (2475Mbps): 4x4 (80MHz), 2x2 (160MHz) 2.4G (1182Mbps): 4x4 (40MHz)
Please insert instructions here
